column1: “This coronavirus is “considerably more lethal than influenzas” and 20 times more deadly than the 1918 flu epidemic. Compared to 1918, doctors understand the virology of the COV-2 virus and already have more than 600 fully sequenced versions of it to study and compare”

“This coronavirus is “considerably more lethal than influenzas” and 20 times more deadly than the 1918 flu epidemic. Compared to 1918, doctors understand the virology of the COV-2 virus and already have more than 600 fully sequenced versions of it to study and compare”
